name: Sabik

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Website made using Next.js and TailwindCSS

services.title: Data Analysis and Interpretation
services.description: Analyse large datasets to extract meaningful insights and patterns. Uses statistical techniques and domain knowledge to uncover trends, correlations, and actionable information.

services.title: Reporting and Visualization
services.description: Create reports, dashboards, and visualizations that present data findings in a clear and comprehensible manner, using tools like Excel, Tableau, Power BI, or custom software to communicate complex data-driven insights to stakeholders, making it easier for decision-makers to understand and act on the information.

services.title: Predictive Modeling and Forecasting
services.description: Builds predictive models using machine learning algorithms and statistical methods. These models can forecast future trends, customer behavior, sales, and more. Predictive modeling enables organizations to proactively plan and make decisions based on anticipated outcomes, optimizing resource allocation and strategies.

services.title: Data Cleaning and Quality Assurance
services.description: Performs data cleaning and quality assurance processes. Ensure that datasets are free from errors, inconsistencies, and missing values.

aboutpara: Pragmatic veteran with a strong interest in reporting and analytics. Competent in extracting, transforming, and reporting on data from databases and spreadsheets utilizing SQL and other technologies. Proficient in manipulating data to create custom reports, charts, and dashboards.

resume.tagline: I'm a Data analyst and software developer.
resume.description: Well-versed with SQL, Python,Power BI and most of the ETL Frameworks and Reporting tools.

experiences.bullets: BI Specialist with emphasis on ETL process.
developed frontend for a react application, created interactive websites using HTML and CSS

education.universityName: Rajiv Gandhi Insititute Of Technology, Kottayam
education.universityPara: Graduated with a four year Computer Science degree with GPA of 8.2 from one of the best colleges in Kerala.
